metadata.title: CVE-2019-12386 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Ampache through 3.9.1. A stored XSS exists inthe localplay.php LocalPlay "add instance" functionality. The injected codeis reflected in the instances menu. This vulnerability can be abused toforce an admin to create a new privileged user whose credentials are knownby the attacker.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12386` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ampache - 3.6-rzb2779+dfsg-0ubuntu9.2
ampache-common - 3.6-rzb2779+dfsg-0ubuntu9.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ampache package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.6-rzb2779+dfsg-0ubuntu9.2').
